metaphor.core: The creation of Frankenstein's Creature and other automatons serves as a metaphor to explore the concepts of component composition versus class inheritance in React. It illustrates how combining independent, specialized parts (composition) leads to more flexible and robust systems compared to rigid hierarchical structures (inheritance).

mapping.fictionElement: Dr. Waldman's automaton built from a single blueprint
mapping.reactConcept: Class inheritance creating rigid, tightly-coupled component hierarchies

mapping.fictionElement: Frankenstein's Creature with chaotic signals/poorly defined props
mapping.reactConcept: Composition with bad or unclear props leading to uncoordinated component behavior

mapping.fictionElement: The Clockwork Nightingale with a central harness and clear sockets
mapping.reactConcept: Composition with well-defined props and interfaces for seamless component collaboration

mapping.fictionElement: Society of perfect parts united by purpose
mapping.reactConcept: Building UIs by composing focused components connected via deliberate, well-named props

metaphor.narrativeArc: The module follows Frankenstein's journey from attempting to assemble a creature with poorly integrated parts (bad composition) to successfully building a 'clockwork nightingale' with well-defined interfaces (good composition), contrasting this with the rigidity of inheritance. This narrative arc highlights the evolution of understanding from rigid structures to flexible, composable systems in React.

problems: Unintended side effects of changes in inherited classes
Uncoordinated component behavior due to poorly defined props
Lack of reusability in tightly coupled systems

chapters.title: The Promise of Patchwork
chapters.focus: Introduces component composition as combining discrete, reusable parts.

chapters.title: The Prison of Purity
chapters.focus: Illustrates the rigidity and problems of class inheritance.

chapters.title: A Monstrous Union
chapters.focus: Shows how composition with poorly defined props can lead to chaotic component behavior.

chapters.title: The Clockwork Nightingale
chapters.focus: Demonstrates good composition with clear, specific props and interfaces.

chapters.title: The Architect's Journal
chapters.focus: Summarizes the philosophy of building UIs through well-composed React components.

interactiveElements: Triggering chaotic behavior with bad props
Observing a well-composed 'Clockwork Nightingale' with clear props
Displaying a final composed Profile Card
